title: Centre for the Development and Evaluation of Complex Interventions for Public Health Improvement (DECIPHer)
abstractText:
This is one of five Centres funded as part of the UKCRC Public Health Research: Centres of Excellence.

DECIPHer, a collaboration between the universities of Bristol, Cardiff and Swansea, tackles public health issues such as diet and nutrition, physical activity, alcohol, tobacco and drug use, to develop and evaluate interventions for children and young people.
Website: www.decipher.uk.net
